name: As a user, I want create the employees through services to carry out this process more quickly

testSteps.description: Example: {RequestType=POST, Uri=http://dummy.restapiexample.com/api/v1/, ResourceApi=create, StatusCode=200, Employee=Diego Zapata, Salary=12321, Age=25}

children.description: Given I make the connection to the api "http://dummy.restapiexample.com/api/v1/" with resource api "create"
When execute the method "POST" to create the employee "Diego Zapata" with salary "12321" and "25"
